game.name: Cooking Battle
game.description:
Another awesome cooking challenge is waiting for you! This time your two favorite and beautiful princesses Rapunzel and Anna have got participated in a popular cooking contest. Today the entire city is celebrating donuts day and these two princesses have also decided to decorate donuts with the help of items shown on the screen. Join Cooking Battle and be prepared to make these wonderful sweets delicious and good-looking and help your favorite princes to bring the trophy to her home!

Your objective in this brand new girls game is to help both the cute princesses to decorate the donuts with sweet syrups, candies and chocolate. Challenge your cooking and sweet decorating abilities to make the best dish in the shortest time possible! Use all the yummy ingredients shown on the bottom side of the screen and let your inner chef skills come out to create a yum yum yummy meal! Start with selecting the color of the dough and then make your donut look extra scrumptious using a delicious topping in this fun HTML5 cooking game!

There are lots of colors to select from. Make sure to pour some chocolate on top of the cake after choosing between white or dark. Do not forget to decorate cakes with the help of nuts and some colorful candy on top. Put different types of candy, whipped cream, or fruits like cherries or a slice of orange in this cool decoration game! Serve the mouth-watering donut with a drink, popcorn or another item! Good luck to win the battle and challenge your opponent in this fast-paced multiplayer cooking game!
